mapper.sql: comment_id, content, create_user_id, create_time, modify_user_id, modify_time, require_id, is_del
mapper.select: SELECT @rownum := @rownum + 1 AS floor, c.* FROM (SELECT @rownum := 0 ) r, (SELECT content.comment_id AS comment_id, content.content AS content, content.create_time AS create_time, content.create_user_id AS create_user_id, content.is_del AS is_del, content.modify_time AS modify_time, content.modify_user_id AS modify_user_id, content.require_id AS require_id, u.user_name AS user_name, d.dept_name as dept_name FROM t_require_comment content INNER JOIN t_user u ON u.user_id = content.create_user_id INNER JOIN t_dept d ON d.dept_id = u.dept_id AND content.require_id =#{requireCommentListCo.requireId} ORDER BY create_time DESC ) c
